items.name: Cheri Berry
description: Consume to cure paralysis. Can be consumed as a reaction to becoming paralyzed.

items.name: Chesto Berry
description: Consume to cure asleep condition. Can be consumed as a reaction to becoming asleep.

items.name: Pecha Berry
description: Consume to cure poison. Can be consumed as a reaction to becoming poisoned or badly poisoned.

items.name: Rawst Berry
description: Consume to cure burn. Can be consumed as a reaction to becoming burned.

items.name: Aspear Berry
description: Consume to cure freeze. Can be consumed as a reaction to becoming frozen.

items.name: Leppa Berry
description: Consume to restore 10 PP to a single move. Can be consumed as a reaction to a move reaching 0 PP.

items.name: Oran Berry
description: Consume to restore 2d4+2 HP. Can be consumed as a reaction ????????????????.
